channel.title: [TUT] Multi Login
channel.description:
[move][glow=red,2,300][shadow=red,left][TUT] Multi Login[/shadow][/glow][/move]
Skill: easy :)
TUT By:[glow=red,2,300]XN[/glow]
Explenation:dual login in runescape, just with a bug on the site! [size=10pt]NO! THIS AINT A BUG THAT CRASH UR COMPUTER![/size]
Tutorial:
[b]Step #0[/b] Enter Runescape.com/.co.uk [IMG]http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/3265/02fh.png[/img]
[b]Step #1[/b] [img]http://img136.imageshack.us/img136/6889/16hp.png[/img] [b]Click[/b] this button to go to the [b]Detail Select[/b] screen.
[b]Step #2[/b] Scroll down till u see a [b]*scroll*[/b] with java types in it. click on the [IMG]http://img57.imageshack.us/img57/8861/46zu.png[/img] button and click this:
[IMG]http://img93.imageshack.us/img93/4721/26zv.png[/img]
[b]Step #3[/b] Choose high or low detail [u][b]UNDER[/b][/u] the java type [b]*scroll*[/b] demo downhere:
[IMG]http://img48.imageshack.us/img48/9519/37rz.png[/img]
[b]Step #4[/b] Now select a world (doesnt care wichone). and play Runescape with 2 accounts! :P screen #1 mustbe just the recomed java screen #2 thisone, must be by this tutorial
[b]WARNING! the loading of runescape will take longer because its an other type of JAVA![/b]
[b]Need help? Post it downhere and ill help u![/b]
[b]All my replys will be downhere ![/b]
[quote="OMGBLOODYPASS"]is this so u can go on the same world togeter? [b]XN: Yes it is, u can log into any world world u want with 2 accounts[/b][/quote]
[quote="yna_ajhear5"]Just a question, won't Jagex see that there is two characters connect from one IP address. (they think your at the library). But when you have them trade eachother, don't you think they'll get suspicious? Is there anything we can do to ensure that they don't get banned? [b]XN: Ill think they can see it, but i and my bro play together at the same time and where not banned for 2 years :\[/b][/quote]

item.title: [TUT] Multi Login
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

This isnt very safe, and I wouldnt call it a "bug"

But anyways, delete your uid.dat and if possible use a proxy. Otherwise your gonna get banned, I've been banned two or three times for multilogins and account interaction.

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT] Multi Login
item.dc:creator: @jhon jhon
item.description:
@jhon wrote:

Guys If you wanna log into 2 accounts at same time all you have to do is :
1. open 2 IE windows up
2. go to www.runescape.com on both
3. select world and detail you want same on both
4.put the details of the 2 accounts in
5. press the login button of both accounts within 2 secs

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT] Multi Login
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

bumfluff120:

[quote author=Bumis link=topic=294.msg3658#msg3658 date=1142442281]
That's old, and Jagex can tell you're doing this, and can ban you for doing this

Way to many warnings from everyone. There are 100,000's of people whp play runescape, and i've been autoing, cheating and multi logging in for 2 years now.[/quote]
kewl

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT] Multi Login
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

XN:

[move][glow=red,2,300][shadow=red,left][TUT] Multi Login[/shadow][/glow][/move]

Skill: easy

TUT By:[glow=red,2,300]XN[/glow]

Explenation:dual login in runescape, just with a bug on the site!
[size=10pt]NO! THIS AINT A BUG THAT CRASH UR COMPUTER![/size]

Tutorial:

Step #0
Enter Runescape.com/.co.uk
[IMG]http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/3265/02fh.png[/img]

Step #1

Click this button to go to the Detail Select screen.

Step #2
Scroll down till u see a scroll with java types in it.
click on the [IMG]http://img57.imageshack.us/img57/8861/46zu.png[/img] button
and click this:

[IMG]http://img93.imageshack.us/img93/4721/26zv.png[/img]

Step #3
Choose high or low detail UNDER the java type scroll
demo downhere:

[IMG]http://img48.imageshack.us/img48/9519/37rz.png[/img]

Step #4
Now select a world (doesnt care wichone).
and play Runescape with 2 accounts!
screen #1 mustbe just the recomed java
screen #2 thisone, must be by this tutorial

WARNING! the loading of runescape will take longer because its an other type of JAVA!

Need help? Post it downhere and ill help u!

All my replys will be downhere !

[quote author=OMGBLOODYPASS link=topic=294.msg3088#msg3088 date=1142176404]
is this so u can go on the same world togeter?
XN: Yes it is, u can log into any world world u want with 2 accounts

[quote author=yna_ajhear5 link=topic=294.msg3100#msg3100 date=1142178160]
Just a question, won't Jagex see that there is two characters connect from one IP address. (they think your at the library). But when you have them trade eachother, don't you think they'll get suspicious? Is there anything we can do to ensure that they don't get banned?
XN: Ill think they can see it, but i and my bro play together at the same time and where not banned for 2 years :\
[/quote][/quote]
so im guessing, you use an outdated version of winblow$

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: [TUT] Multi Login
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

If you log in and trade across two accounts, they will ban. It's one of those rules they've just decided to enforce.

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT] Multi Login
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

Just a question, won't Jagex see that there is two characters connect from one IP address. (they think your at the library). But when you have them trade eachother, don't you think they'll get suspicious? Is there anything we can do to ensure that they don't get banned?

Read full topic
